abstractText: The composition and percent cover of vegetation species in floodplain restoration areas is measured to evaluate the progression of restoration cover types toward the desired condition and to inform potential maintenance needs such as weed management.Data collection methods are described in Floodplain Vegetation Composition, Cover, and Woody Species Natural Recruitment Method #1310 [https://www.monitoringresources.org/Document/Method/Details/1310].
title: Floodplain Vegetation Composition Analysis v1.0
